statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT id, facility_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE facility_id = 3;
SELECT id, maintenance_type, scheduled_date, completion_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT id, facility_id, maintenance_type, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date >= '2021-09-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT id, maintenance_type, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE facility_id = 2 ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY maintenance_type HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY facility_id, scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT facility_id, maintenance_type, scheduled_date, completion_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT description, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 3 AND maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, facility_id FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_report WHERE technician_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT id, facility_id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_report WHERE technician_id = 1001 AND completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT m.schedule_id, m.work_description, s.facility_id FROM maintenance_report m INNER JOIN maintenance_schedule s ON m.schedule_id = s.id;
SELECT MAX(maintenance_date) AS latest_maintenance_date, facility_id FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY facility_id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY schedule_id DESC;
SELECT facility_id, equipment_name FROM facility_equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'HVAC';
SELECT report_text FROM maintenance_report WHERE schedule_id = 3;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM facility_equipment ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date = '2023-05-15';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE facility_id = 1 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM maintenance_report WHERE report_id = 10
SELECT facility_id, equipment_name FROM facility_equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'HVAC' AND manufacturer = 'Carrier'
SELECT facility_id, equipment_type FROM facility_equipment WHERE facility_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY facility_id ASC

SELECT m.schedule_id, r.report_text, e.equipment_name FROM maintenance_schedule m JOIN maintenance_report r ON m.schedule_id = r.schedule_id JOIN facility_equipment e ON m.facility_id = e.facility_id WHERE e.equipment_type = 'Boiler'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facility;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE type='Heavy Machinery';
SELECT report_id, report_date, technician_id FROM maintenance_report ORDER BY report_date DESC;

SELECT facility_name, equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule JOIN facility ON maintenance_schedule.facility_id = facility.facility_id JOIN equipment ON maintenance_schedule.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facility WHERE location='New York';
SELECT equipment_name, type, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE type='Computer' AND manufacturer='Apple';
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(*) FROM maintenance_schedule JOIN facility ON maintenance_schedule.facility_id = facility.facility_id GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type='Preventive' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM facility_managers;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, manager_id FROM hotel_facilities WHERE manager_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT equipment_name, status, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT schedule_date, status FROM maintenance_schedules WHERE facility_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT report_id, report_date, reported_by FROM maintenance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT facility_name, location FROM hotel_facilities WHERE manager_id = UUID('12345-67890-12345-67890')
SELECT report_id, report_date, reported_by, LEFT(report_text, 50) AS short_text FROM maintenance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT ms.schedule_id, mr.report_date, mr.reported_by, ms.status FROM maintenance_schedules ms JOIN maintenance_reports mr ON ms.schedule_id = mr.schedule_id
SELECT f.manager_name, f.contact_number, e.equipment_name, e.status FROM facility_managers f JOIN equipment e ON f.manager_id = e.facility_id ORDER BY f.manager_name ASC
